channel.name: Excel importer
channel.description:
This channel will serve up an Excel spread sheet which has a button that can be used send the contents of a Excel table back into this Iguana web service.
The Iguana webservice takes that data and turns each row into a JSON object which is then pushed into the queue.
This is useful since it gives the ability to upload tabular data on mass into Iguana - it forms a link between Iguana which is power engine for processing data and Excel which is very accessible to non technical users.
See: http://help.interfaceware.com/forums/topic/serving-live-data-into-excel
Use this channel with the From Excel Importer.
